content:
Question 42 of 50
You plan to automate the deployment
of a virtual machine scale set that uses
the Windows Server 2016 Datacenter
Image.
You need to ensure that when the
Scale set virtual machines are
provisioned, they have web server
Components installed.
Which two actions should you
pertorm?
Each correct answer presents part of
the solution
Select the correct answer(s)
Upload a configuration script
Create an automation account
Modify the extensionProfile section of the Azure Resource Manager template
Create a new virtual scale set in the Azure portal
